transArray.content: The service attitude is very good. The hotel room is clean and tidy. The breakfast is also very good. It is convenient to travel and there is a good subway not far away.

Hello dear guests! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Your satisfaction is our greatest encouragement and support. The welcome gifts carefully prepared by the hotel for you carry our most sincere greetings and expectations for you. We are committed to providing every guest with meticulous, thoughtful, warm and considerate services. We strive to make every guest happy to become a repeat customer. The hotel is located at Gate 2 East of Badili Automobile Park. Take Metro Line 6 from Haidian Wuluju Station and exit from Exit A. You can walk directly to the hotel in 3-5 minutes. The hotel's breakfast time is from 7:00 to 11:00. The Chinese and Western buffet breakfast has a variety of varieties, is nutritious and delicious, freshly cooked noodles, hot soup noodles and small pastries will satisfy your special delicacies without leaving home. Looking forward to meeting you again and wishing you a happy life, General Manager: Li Changxia
